meanings.definition: To strike a surface with a sharp blow
meanings.sent1: He knocks on the door to ask for candy.
meanings.sent2: She knocks the ball with her foot during the game.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocks over the vase while chasing a bug.
meanings.sent4: The storm knocks against the windows, making them rattle.
meanings.sent5: The woodpecker knocks on the tree trunk loudly.

meanings.sent1: The knocks on the door startled the sleeping dog.
meanings.sent2: I heard three loud knocks on the window last night.
meanings.sent3: The knocks on the head made him see stars.
meanings.sent4: The knocks of the hammer echoed through the workshop.
meanings.sent5: The knocks on the door grew louder and more urgent.

meanings.definition: A sound made by a blow or impact
meanings.sent1: The knocks on the floor were coming from the room above.
meanings.sent2: The knocks of the falling books echoed in the library.
meanings.sent3: The knocks on the wall sounded like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: The knocks of the drum filled the room with rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The knocks on the window startled the birds outside.
